## Solution 3

```{r}
species <- read.csv('data/species.csv')
df <- animals %>%
  inner_join(species, c('species_id' = 'id')) %>%
  filter(genus == 'Perognathus')
df$species_id <- factor(df$species_id)
summary(glm(species_id ~ weight, family = binomial, data = df))
```
